max-rows.name: Max rows
max-rows.description: The maximum number of rows in the menu

show-bg.name: Show background in menu
show-bg.description: Adds background to the menu for better contrast

config-path.name: Custom config
config-path.description: Path to your custom config file

default-config-path.name: Default config
default-config-path.description:
Path to your default config file.
This file stores the <cy>default configuration</c> for the mod. Changes in this file <cr>do not</c> affect anything! The only point of this file is to store the default configuration, so that if you mess up a part of the <cg>custom configuration</c>, you could replace that part with the default one

Also, all changes to this file reset on every game startup
